attributes.action: Limit the price a new house can be sold to cost + percentage profit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently new builds are sold at the local market value, ensuring the building of new estates appears exceptionally profitable, leading to excessive building of new housing in expensive areas, holding the prices high.

If new builds could only be sold at cost plus a reasonable percentage profit, there would be more incentive to build in less expensive areas and make some houses available at affordable prices. This would not prevent constructors from making a profit but encourage consideration of where to build.
